website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, versatile, and available in a selection of vibrant hues. This brand offers a set of taper candles for every occasion.
pros: Available in sets of 10, 12, and 15 taper candles
Offered in a wide range of colors
cons: Only 4 or 5 hours of burn time per candle

customer_reviews.title: The candles are white under the color coat
customer_reviews.text: The color is not all the way through, they are white candles dipped in the color coating of your choosing. I bought black and purple and they are white underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: NOT Dripless
customer_reviews.text: These are not dripless at all!! Disappointed with this purchase. I had them burning for about 30 minutes and they dripped everywhere. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Not a drip less or dripless candle.
customer_reviews.text: "Drip less" candles weren't so drip less. Ruined the linens at my wedding and have to now replace their linens. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Using for my wedding
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Using for my wedding. Tested the candle for 4 hrs. No dripping at all, the candle burned quickly the first 45mins maybe down 2 inches and after that a very slow even burn.
customer_reviews.author: brooke T

customer_reviews.title: Bases are a bit smaller than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: Candles arrived on time and in good order, for the most part, they are nice candles. However, most 10" tapers i Have purchased in the past have a 7/8" base. These are undersized at the base and required trimming the bottom and, in some cases, my require using something to get the candle to fit properly in a holder without wiggling about.
customer_reviews.author: Reynold F. Heuer

customer_reviews.title: Dripless
customer_reviews.text: Excellent candles for the money. I have ordered numerous boxes, which arrive unbroken, straight and consistent in color. They light readily, and burn fairly slowly without any dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Disaster, not dripless!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking candles that I was very pleased with until we actually lit them. Used for a large Christmas Dinner party. They completely ruined the tablecloths! Dripless, - entirely NOT. They spilled hot wax all over the candle holders and onto the table cloth. Guest had to warn us of a potential fire hazard. One Guest even commented they had never seen a regular candle drip so much, especially not one that claimed to be dripless while spill hot wax all over the place. Embarrassing and Dangerous! A total mess.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Everyday Candle
customer_reviews.text: These candles look lovely on my dining room table and are exactly what I was looking for. We eat in the dining room a lot and I use large quantities in different colors. These are very pretty; burn very nicely and were sold in a large box so that I don't have to keep buying pairs. I will buy more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Erika P. Lapham

customer_reviews.title: Dripped
customer_reviews.text: Dripped and ruined my table clothes. I purchased these before and they were ok. See the picture, don’t know what happened this time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with these candles. I burn candles every night but tapers are a bit of a splurge over my usual tea lights or votives. I chose pink. They are a beautiful rich bright happy shade of pink like a grown up bubblegum shade. They burn evenly, and completely. No messy drips. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Pastamama

customer_reviews.title: No drips here!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews for these, it's an absolute mystery of they will drip or not... All I can do is tell you mine did not. They burned about halfway down over the course of a two hour indoor dinner and not one drop. The inside of the candle is white, but you can hardly tell unless you're looking down at it, and it's really not a huge deal. The purple color is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great candles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one box of the chocolate color and one box of the cream colored candles. They're great! They burn efficiently and the colors are beautiful. The color is all the way through the candle and they look lovely on the dining room table. I would definitely purchase this brand again. It seems the price is reasonable and the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: janie

customer_reviews.title: White candles dipped in different colors
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely disappointed! These candles are NOT all the way through. They’re white candles dipped in other color coatings. I purchased them in grey, yellow, red, black. Only to find out they’re not real. The window for return is expired and I just wasted money. This information is not clear in the sellers description. I should have read the other customers reviews. I’m feeling so frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Truly Dripless!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different candlestick colors from three different sellers. This seller had the best packaging and the candle was truly dripless and the perfect “burgundy” color. Other brand packaging is cheap plastic that you cut into and cannot be resealed. I let it burn for 3 hours and there was absolutely no dripping. Only thing to note was I had to trim the wick from the underside of the candle so that it would fit steady in the candle holder. Easy fix. Each photo of the candle with a flame is after 1 hr, 2 hrs and 3 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Shopsters902

customer_reviews.title: Not black all the way through

customer_reviews.title: Nice product

customer_reviews.author: Dmytro

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Candles!

customer_reviews.author: RomaGoods

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS GOOD AS ADVERTISED

customer_reviews.title: so I'm happy to have them

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and clean

customer_reviews.author: C Buehler

customer_reviews.title: These candles were slightly more red than orange like the picture looked but over all I like them
customer_reviews.text: These candles were slightly more red than orange like the picture looked but over all I like them! Hey I’m hey don’t drip at all which is what I was worried about. They came packaged well and were in great condition. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn D.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the value!

customer_reviews.title: Lovely candles and no drips

They should survive being burned during the four Sunday dinners of Advent and still be tall enough to light once again on Christmas day. The colors are lovely and true to the images advertised. I will definitely buy more D'light candles to light my dinner gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought tons of these for our navy and maroon fall wedding, and they were gorgeous. I got candle sticks from the dollar store. They were the best addition to our flowers. They are advertised as less drop, but they definitely were inconsistent—some dripped, some didn’t; however, the wax was easy to remove. Our venue had no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Unbroken
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived was concerned that the manufacturer's box was not inside an Amazon box with "air pillows" to keep them from breaking. Shipping an unprotected box of candles seems very risky. Fortunately none of the candles were broken. Sometimes it is better to be lucky than good.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Sage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!

customer_reviews.author: Karakreative

customer_reviews.title: Good Tapers for Quiet Dinners

customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: so happy I bought them! Now I need more candlestick holders!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles in the red color. They are for decoration only, for the holidays... I don't think I will be lighting them so I'm unable to comment on how quickly or slowly they burn. They are rail straight, and that is important to me, and they fit perfectly in my table wreath and also in four of my candlestick holders. I am so glad that I have a whole box full now, the price is great for the quality. Happy holidays!
customer_reviews.author: pursuetruth

customer_reviews.title: Great candles

These fit my candlesticks (two different sets) perfectly and while they do drip, it's nothing like ones I've bought in the past. Good buy.

customer_reviews.title: not uniform

I had to melt the bottom to make it stand straight. But the other candles fit nicely. Initially I thought the hole was cut bigger but I took one of the red and green into the center whole and it fits. The black candle was noticeably skinnier than the other 2.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sawyers

customer_reviews.title: Look Pretty if Not Burned

customer_reviews.title: Did not drip !

This does depend on environmental factors (wind and ac) but our reception was inside during the fall so no ac. I was thrilled and will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality candles, long burn

After burning a dozen I’ve only had one drip on its first burn. I’ve extinguished and relit a few, and I do tend to get a drip or three on the relight because it doesn’t burn evenly right off the bat, but that’s to be expected. I get better burn time than advertised, nearly 7h on the first set (timed). Have and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Seth

customer_reviews.title: D'light Online Kwanzaa Candle Set
